# Short title of solved problem and solution

<DecisionHeader status="proposed" lastUpdate="2022-12-08" created="2022-12-08" deciders={["rishabhpoddar", "sattvikc"]} proposedBy={["sattvikc"]} />

## Context and Problem Statement

Should multitenancy be a separate recipe?

## Considered Options

* Multitenancy should not be a separate recipe
* Multitenancy should be a separate recipe


## Decision Outcome

Chosen option: Multitenancy should be a separate recipe, because

* Intutively, multi-tenancy is not specific to a particular recipe
* Enables multi-tenancy to be expanded to other recipes in future


## Pros and Cons of the Options

### Multitenancy should not be a separate recipe

<ArgumentCon> Causes duplication or rework while expanding the functionality to other recipes </ArgumentCon>

### Multitenancy should be a separate recipe

<ArgumentPro> Intutively, multi-tenancy is not specific to a particular recipe </ArgumentPro>
<ArgumentPro> One place to expose functions for multi-tenant config management </ArgumentPro>
<ArgumentPro> Easily expand functionality to other recipes </ArgumentPro>
<ArgumentNeut> Yet another recipe </ArgumentNeut>
